briefTitle: CT-P13 (Infliximab) Subcutaneous Administration in Patients With Moderately to Severely Active Ulcerative Colitis (LIBERTY-UC)
officialTitle: A Randomized, Placebo Controlled, Double-Blind, Phase 3 Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of the Subcutaneous Injection of CT-P13 (CT-P13 SC) as Maintenance Therapy in Patients With Moderately to Severely Active Ulcerative Colitis
summary: This is Phase 3, Randomized, Placebo-controlled study to demonstrate superiority of CT-P13 SC over Placebo SC in Patients With Moderately to Severely Active Ulcerative Colitis

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Patients Achieving Clinical Remission at Week 54
